recipe.title: Meal Prep Pesto Chicken Pasta Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: 1 lb ; large chicken breast, cooked and diced ; (453 g)
2 cups ; asparagus, cut into 1 1/2-in/38-mm pieces ; (250 g)
2 cups ; whole wheat penne, measured dry ; (200 g)

steps.step: Heat the oil in a large nonstick skillet. Toss in the asparagus, season with a bit of salt, and sautée until the begin to soften, about 3 minutes.
Pour on the pesto, pasta, and chicken and stir to combine.
Toss in the cherry tomatoes and give everything a stir to combine and warm through.
Distribute pasta mixture evenly between 4 tupperware containers.
Can be refrigerated up to 4 days.

Toss in the asparagus, season with a bit of salt, and sautée until the begin to soften, about 3 minutes.
Pour on the pesto, pasta, and chicken and stir to combine.
